prompt:
Patient: Yeah. For at least three months.

Nurse: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you noticed any blood in your stool during this time?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you experienced any nausea or vomiting along with the diarrhea?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you. Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you.

Nurse: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you noticed any weight loss or changes in your appetite?

Patient: No. No weight loss.

responses.gpt4: That's good to hear, Mr. Valenzuela. Do you feel any abdominal pain or discomfort?
responses.our_model: That's good to hear, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you noticed any changes in your appetite or eating habits due to the diarrhea?
